story.title: Sage's Underwater Treasure Hunt
story.summary: Young Marina discovers she can breathe underwater and embarks on an amazing ocean adventure to find a lost treasure and help sea creatures in need.
scenes: Sage playing on the beach and finding a magical seashell
The seashell glowing and giving Sage the power to breathe underwater
Sage diving into the ocean for the first time and meeting colorful fish
A wise old turtle telling Sage about the lost treasure of friendship
Sage swimming through a beautiful coral reef garden
Meeting a family of dolphins who need help finding their lost baby
Sage and the dolphins searching through underwater caves
Finding the baby dolphin trapped in old fishing nets
Sage carefully freeing the baby dolphin with help from sea horses
The grateful dolphin family showing Sage a secret underwater city
Sage meeting the seahorse king who guards the treasure
The king explaining that the real treasure is helping others
Sage helping to clean plastic from the ocean with whale friends
Building a new home for hermit crabs using clean shells
Teaching young fish how to stay safe from dangerous currents
Sage discovering she can talk to all sea creatures
Organizing a grand underwater parade with all her new friends
The seahorse king giving Sage a special pearl of kindness
Sage promising to protect the ocean and visit often
Sage returning to the beach as the ocean waves goodbye

art_style.name: Modern_KPop
art_style.coloring_style: modern K-pop style black and white line art, stylish clean lines
art_style.cover_style: modern K-pop style with trendy neon colors, fashionable cover
art_style.complexity: stylish modern characters with fashion elements, clean trendy lines
